name: The Light That Fell From The Sky
name_original: The Light That Fell From The Sky
description:
Story

Earth has been destroyed by cosmic horrors. Since the moment the eldritch beings went back to sleep, humanity has started its journey to take back the surface. However, the stars have awoken once again with thirst for conquest.

You, an underground outsider from the colonies, work for Cosmos Security Corp and are responsible to help the surface dweller humans stay alive with their limited electricity. But only from 10pm to 6am.

The invincible cosmic horrors really do hate artificial light.

With the game open, press Alt + Enter for Fullscreen.

Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • Left Mouse Click to interact with objects.
  • Use the computer to control the lights.
  • Left Mouse Click on colonies to turn lights ON/OFF.
  • ESC to leave the computer screen.
